title: Kirk Minihane is a Bed Bug
description:
Kirk Minihane has plenty of experience with spineless whiney journalists who run around ruining the lives of those who dare question them. So when New York Times columnist Bret Stephens stomped on a professor for comparing him to bed bugs, Kirk paid special attention. On this epic episode of the Kirk Minihane Show, Minihane takes on the privileged elite in the media, his frenemies at Barstool, his former interim producer, and a few people who just looked at him funny.Â 


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
